verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:9
verses.text: But if they cannot contain, let them marry: for it is better to marry than to burn.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:10
verses.text: And unto the married I command, yet not I, but the Lord, Let not the wife depart from her husband:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:11
verses.text: But and if she depart, let her remain unmarried, or be reconciled to her husband: and let not the husband put away his wife.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 7:12
verses.text: But to the rest speak I, not the Lord: If any brother hath a wife that believeth not, and she be pleased to dwell with him, let him not put her away.
